package.name: mir_align_with_object
package.description:
1. get params from planner about which object to align to 2. get the pose from pose selector by publishing the name obtained in 1) 3. trigger direct base controller to reach the pose published in 2)
result: end product of this action is a list of poses in map/odom frame that the robot needs to move to in order to be in front of the objects.
package.author: Oscar Lima
